attributes.action: Drop all plans for airport expansion and take steps to substantially reduce airport capacity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Drop all plans for airport expansion and take steps to substantially reduce airport capacity."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13986.asp

Prime Minister's Office
